gurmukhi: ਸੰਗ ਲੲੇ ਫਿਰੈ ਪਾਪਨ ਹੀ || ਤਜ ਭਾਜ ਕ੍ਰਿਅਾ ਜਗ ਜਾਪਨ ਕੀ || ਦਿਵ ਪਿਤ੍ਰਨ ਪਾਵਕ ਮਾਨਹ ਗੇ || ਸਭ ਅਾਪਨ ਤੇ ਘਟਿ ਜਾਨਹ ਗੇ ||੯੬||
transliteration: San Lae Phirai Paapan Hee|| Taj Bhaaj Kriaa Jag Jaapan Ki|| Divpitran Paavak Maanah Ge|| Sabh Aapan Te Ghattee Jaanah Ge||96||
translation: All of them will roam, committing sinful acts and the activites of recitation and worship will flee from the world; they will not have any faith in gods and manes and will consider all others inferior to them.96.

gurmukhi: ਭੱਜਿਓ ਸੁ ਧਰਮ || ਪ੍ਰਚੁਰਿਓ ਕੁਕਰਮ || ਜਹ ਤਹ ਜਹਾਨ || ਤਜ ਭਾਜ ਅਾਨ ||੯੭||
transliteration: Bhajjio Su Dharam|| Pravhurio Koukaram|| Jah Tah Jahaan|| Taj Bhaaj Aan||97||
translation: The dharma will run away and there will be propagation of evil Karmas; there will not remain any propriety of conduct in the world.97.

gurmukhi: ਨਿਤ ਪ੍ਰਤਿ ਅਨਰਥ || ਕਰ ਹੈ ਸਮਰਥ || ੳੁਠ ਭਾਜ ਧਰਮ || ਲੈ ਸੰਗ ਸੁ ਕਰਮ ||੯੮||
transliteration: Nit Prat(i) Anarth|| Kar Hai Samarth|| Outh Bhaaj Dharam|| Lai San Su Karam||98||
translation: The powerful people will always commit bad deeds and the dharma will flee alongwith goods acts.98.

gurmukhi: ਕਰ ਹੈ ਕੁਚਾਰ || ਤਜ ਸੁਭ ਅਚਾਰ || ਭੲੀ ਕ੍ਰਿਅਾ ਅੳੁਰ || ਸਭ ਠੌਰ ਠੌਰ ||੯੯||
transliteration: Kar Hai Kouchaar|| Taj Soubh Achaar|| Bhaaikridaa Aur|| Sabh Thaur Thaur||99||
translation: Forsaking good character, all will be absorbed in bad conduct and wonderful activities will become apparent at several places.99.

gurmukhi: ਨਹੀ ਕਰਤ ਸੰਗ || ਪ੍ਰੇਰਤਿ ਅਨੰਗ || ਕਰ ਸੁਤਾ ਭੋਗ || ਜੋ ਹੈ ਅਜੋਗ ||੧੦੦||
transliteration: Nahi Karat San|| Prerat(i) Anan|| Kar Soutaa Bhog|| Jo Hai Ajog||100||
translation: Not absorbing themselves with the sexual enjoyment with their wives, they will have sexual relations with these unbecoming daughter.100.

gurmukhi: ਤਜ ਲਾਜ ਭਾਜ || ਸੰਜੁਤ ਸਮਾਜ || ਘਟ ਚਲਾ ਧਰਮ || ਬਢਿਓ ਅਧਰਮ ||੧੦੧||
transliteration: Taj Laaj Bhaaj|| Sanjout Samaaj|| Ghat Chalaa Dharam Badhio Adharam||101||
translation: The whole society will be on the run for the abandonment of shame; adharma will increase and dharma will decrease.101.

gurmukhi: ਕ੍ਰੀੜਤ ਕੁਨਾਰ || ਤਜ ਧਰਮ ਵਾਰ || ਬਢਿ ਗੲਿਓ ਭਰਮ || ਭਾਜੰਤ ਧਰਮ ||੧੦੨||
transliteration: Kreedat Kinaar|| Taj Dharam Uaar|| Badh(i) Gad Bharam|| Bhaajant Dharam||102||
translation: Forsaking dharma, the people will have sexual enjoyment with the prostitutes; the illusions will increase and the dharma will run away.102.

gurmukhi: ਦੇਸਨ ਬਿਦੇਸ || ਪਾਪੀ ਨਰੇਸ਼ || ਨਰਮੀ ਨ ਕੋੲਿ || ਪਾਪ ਅਤਿ ਹੋੲਿ ||੧੦੩||
transliteration: Desan Bides|| Paapi Daresh|| Narmina Koe||paap At(i) Hoe||103||
translation: In all the countries, amongst the sinful kings, no follower of dharma will be left.103.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧੂ ਸਤ੍ਰਾਸ || ਜਹ ਤਹ ੳੁਦਾਸ || ਪਾਪੀਨ ਰਾਜ || ਗ੍ਹਿ ਸਰਬ ਸਾਜ ||੧੦੪||
transliteration: Saadhoo Satraas|| Jah Tah Udaas|| Paapin Raaj|| Grah(i) Sarab Saaj||104
translation: The saints, in their fear, will be seen in depression here and there; the sin will reign in all the houses.104.

gurmukhi: ਸਭ ਦ੍ਰੋਨ ਗਿਰਵਰ ਸਿਖਰ ਤਰ ਨਰ ਪਾਪ ਕਰਕ ਭੲੇ ਭਨੌ || ੳੁਠ ਭਾਜ ਧਰਮ ਸਭਰਮ ਹੁਅੈ ਚਮਕੰਤ ਦਾਮਨ ਸੋ ਮਨੌ ||
transliteration: Sabh Dron Girvar Sikhar Tar Nar Paap Karak Bhae Bhanau|| Outh Bhaaj Dharam Sabharam Huai Chamkant Daamanndso Mamau||
translation: Somewhere there will be very great sins like the top of Dronagiri mountain; all the people will abandon dharma and live in the flashing lighting of illusion;

gurmukhi: ਕਿਧੌ ਸੂਦ੍ਰ ਸੁਭਟ ਸਮਾਜ ਸੰਜੁਤ ਜੀਤ ਹੈ ਬਸੁਧਾ ਥਲੀ || ਕਿਧੌ ਅੱਤ੍ਰ ਛੱਤ੍ਰ ਤਜੇ ਭਜੇ ਅਰੁ ਅੳੁਰ ਕ੍ਰਿਅਾ ਚਲੀ ||੧੦੫||
transliteration: Kidhau Soodra Soubhat Samaaj Sanjout Jeet Hai Basudhaa Thali|| Kidhau Attra Chhatra Taje Bhaje Ar(u) Aur Kreeaa Chalee||105||
translation: Somewhere the Shudras, bedecked with warriors will conquer the earth and somewhere the Kshatriyas, forsaking the weapons and arms, will be running hither and thither; there will be the prevalence of different types of activities.105.

gurmukhi: ਨ੍ਰਿਪ ਦੇਸ ਦੇਸ ਬਿਦੇਸ ਜੱਹ ਤੱਹ ਪਾਪ ਕਰਮ ਸਭੈ ਲਗੇ || ਨਰ ਲਾਜ ਛਾਡ ਨਿਲਾਜ ਹੁਅੈ ਫਿਰੈ ਧਰਮ ਕਰਮ ਸਭੈ ਭਗੇ ||
transliteration: Nrip Des Bides Jahh Tahh Paap Karam Sabhai Lage|| Nar Laaj Chhaad Nilaaj Huai Phirai Dharam Karam Sabhai Bhage||
translation: The kings of various countries will engross themselves in sinful actions; the individuals will roam unashamedly, abandoning their shame; the religious injunctions will speed away;
